TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Constants extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi sealed Constants extends System.Object

summary.span: 模块包含杂项常数。
这些常量可以在代码中的任何地方使用。

span.span: These constants can be used anywhere in your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模块支持与许多 Visual Basic 枚举的成员相对应的 Visual Basic 语言常量：This module supports the Visual Basic language constants that correspond to the members of many Visual Basic enumerations:

related.span: Visual Basic 运行时库成员

summary.span: 指示在某个消息框中单击了 按钮。

span.span: Indicates that the button was clicked in a message box.

summary.span: 由 函数返回。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 `MsgBox` 函数时，可以 `MsgBoxResult` 在代码中使用枚举来替换实际值。When you call the `MsgBox` function, you can use the `MsgBoxResult` enumeration in your code in place of the actual values. `MsgBox`函数返回 `MsgBoxResult` 枚举值。The `MsgBox` function returns a `MsgBoxResult` enumeration value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 `Dir` 、 `GetAttr` 或 `SetAttr` 函数时，可以 `FileAttribute` 在代码中使用枚举来替换实际值。When you call the `Dir`, `GetAttr`, or `SetAttr` functions, you can use the `FileAttribute` enumeration in your code in place of the actual values. `Attributes`参数采用 `FileAttribute` 枚举成员。The `Attributes` argument takes the `FileAttribute` enumeration members. 执行文件 i/o 操作时， `My.Computer.FileSystem` 对象可提供比旧的文件 i/o 方法更好的性能和易用性。When performing file I/O operations, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides greater performance and ease of use than legacy file I/O methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅 对象。For more information, see object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用与日期相关的函数时，可以在代码中使用以下枚举成员来代替实际值。When you call date-related functions, you can use the following enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values. 一些与日期相关的函数采用 `DayOfWeek` 参数和 `WeekOfYear` /或参数。Some date-related functions take a `DayOfWeek` argument, a `WeekOfYear` argument, or both. `FirstDayOfWeek`枚举指定参数的有效值以及函数的 `DayOfWeek` 可能的返回值。The `FirstDayOfWeek` enumeration specifies the valid values for the `DayOfWeek` arguments, as well as the possible return values from the functions. `DayOfWeek`参数采用 `FirstDayOfWeek` 枚举成员。The `DayOfWeek` argument takes the `FirstDayOfWeek` enumeration members. 与日期相关的函数还返回 `FirstDayOfWeek` 除) 以外 (值 `System` 。Date-related functions also return `FirstDayOfWeek` values (except `System`).
